properties.areaDesc: Lawrence, IN; Jackson, IN; Washington, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 5 at 11:35AM EST until January 6 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterways
in Indiana...

East Fork White River...White River...

.Minor lowland flooding will continue in a few locations along the
lower White River and at one location along the East Fork White
River.

A strong storm system may bring heavy rainfall back to the area by next weekend.
This could renew flooding early next week. Monitor forecasts thru this week.

The Flood Warning continues for
The East Fork White River at Seymour.
* until Monday afternoon.
* At  9:45 AM Sunday the stage was 13.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 12.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...It will continue to fall to below flood stage by late
tonight.
* At 13.5 feet...Lowland flood continues. Jackson County Road 700 E
begins to flood.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
